channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeepSeek shocked the AI world this week. Here's how tech CEOs responded
item.description: DeepSeek's sudden emergence onto the U.S. tech scene this week roiled markets and provided plenty of fodder for earnings calls.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Atlassian closes at highest since 2022 after reporting better-than-expected earnings, revenue outlook
item.description: Atlassian benefited from robust cloud and data center growth during the period as more customers turned to artificial intelligence solutions.

item.title: Eaton reports mixed results but makes clear its AI data center business is still full steam ahead
item.description: The industrial stock shook off earlier losses and turned positive in afternoon trading.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Alphabet-backed fintech GoCardless halves losses, targets first annual profit in 2026
item.description: GoCardless reported a net loss of £35.1 million in the full year ending June 2024, down 55% year-over-year.

item.title: Commerzbank posts 20% hike in annual profit and launches new share buyback as it wards off UniCredit
item.description: Commerzbank on Friday unexpectedly released quarterly results, touting "record" annual profit and announcing a new share buyback scheme.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
